body: This will allow using the same commands as run by travis via the Makefile for local development. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/toktok/website/34)

comment_regular_data.body:
Reviewed 4 of 11 files at r1.
Review status: 4 of 8 files reviewed at latest revision, 3 unresolved discussions.

---

*[README.md, line 9 at r1](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/website/34#-KaBUoYEWsYjTnLlE5lj:-KaBUoYGNSgiI5P_oECS:br0m0zx) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/website/blob/c654ca73b8cce95e8ea7c69a373c907488b5b316/README.md#L9)):*
> ```Markdown
> To work on the website you need the following things:
> 
> - Jekyll and mdl via ruby gems: `gem install jekyll mdl` (mdl is optinal, for linting the markdown)
> ```

s/optinal/optional

---

*[README.md, line 10 at r1](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/website/34#-KaBVM0F2wYDjIMK6B97:-KaBVM0F2wYDjIMK6B98:b-x02rcp) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/website/blob/c654ca73b8cce95e8ea7c69a373c907488b5b316/README.md#L10)):*
> ```Markdown
> 
> - Jekyll and mdl via ruby gems: `gem install jekyll mdl` (mdl is optinal, for linting the markdown)
> - pandoc, e.g. via `apt-get install pandoc` or <http://pandoc.org/installing.html>
> ```

May want to include `cabal install pandoc` since cabal is included in the Haskell platform and basically the Haskell version of ruby gems.

---

*[README.md, line 22 at r1](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/website/34#-KaBdNyoRz_VKHz8i_a-:-KaBdNyqBUZByY9-De4f:b-codwwr) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/website/blob/c654ca73b8cce95e8ea7c69a373c907488b5b316/README.md#L22)):*
> ```Markdown
> - `make spec`: download and parse the spec with pandoc (included in `all`)
> - `make lint`: run markdown linter `mdl`
> - `make check`: runs linkchecker
> ```

s/runs/run

---


*Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/website/34)*
<!-- Sent from Reviewable.io -->

Reviewed 11 of 11 files at r1.
Review status: all files reviewed at latest revision, 4 unresolved discussions, some commit checks failed.

---

*[Makefile, line 23 at r1](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/website/34#-KaCH9jjtAO9faoiDcLq:-KaCH9jjtAO9faoiDcLr:b-6rq8qh) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/website/blob/c654ca73b8cce95e8ea7c69a373c907488b5b316/Makefile#L23)):*
> ```Makefile
> changelog: toktok/changelog/c-toxcore.md
> toktok/changelog/c-toxcore.md:
> 	cp $@.dist $@
> ```

Clearly c-toxcore.md depends on c-toxcore.md.dist. Please add this dependency. You can then use `$<` here.

Theoretically you could even do:
```make
toktok/%/c-toxcore.md: toktok/%/c-toxcore.md.dist
        cp $< $@
        curl https://git-critique.herokuapp.com/hello/$* >> $@
```

Up to you if you want to do that.

---

Done. --- *[README.md, line 9 at r1](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/website/34#-KaBUoYEWsYjTnLlE5lj:-KaDbvZcsPJ2z92tDXeK:b-896fix) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/website/blob/c654ca73b8cce95e8ea7c69a373c907488b5b316/README.md#L9)):*

Done.
`cabal install pandoc` will take half an hour, while the apt-get version takes 1 minute. Perhaps note that we need at least version ..something.. (I don't actually know, but I know that 1.12 (Ubuntu trusty) works and 1.9 (Ubuntu precise) doesn't). --- *Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/website/34)*

Review status: all files reviewed at latest revision, 3 unresolved discussions, some commit checks failed. --- *[README.md, line 10 at r1](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/website/34#-KaBVM0F2wYDjIMK6B97:-KaDkBChe1nf6rBDSktm:b-eh06wn) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/website/blob/c654ca73b8cce95e8ea7c69a373c907488b5b316/README.md#L10)):*
Previously, iphydf wrote…
`cabal install pandoc` will take half an hour, while the apt-get version takes 1 minute. Perhaps note that we need at least version ..something.. (I don't actually know, but I know that 1.12 (Ubuntu trusty) works and 1.9 (Ubuntu precise) doesn't).
so better remove it again? --- *Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/website/34)*

--- Reviewed 1 of 1 files at r3. Review status: all files reviewed at latest revision, 3 unresolved discussions, some commit checks failed. --- *Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/website/34#-:-KaDmS0KAM0mV8wVmmdc:b-jbsf8z)*

Review status: all files reviewed at latest revision, 4 unresolved discussions, some commit checks failed.

---

*[Makefile, line 28 at r3](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/website/34#-KaDm_9cgHZWcqBrm_Nt:-KaDm_9cgHZWcqBrm_Nu:b-wnlakj) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/website/blob/7e0c2790d9143b359c1797a8b063b3bfa83f0864/Makefile#L28)):*
> ```Makefile
> 
> spec: toktok/spec.md
> toktok/spec.md: hs-toxcore
> ```

Perhaps make it depend on `hs-toxcore $(shell find hs-toxcore -name "*.lhs" 2> /dev/null)`. This way, once hs-toxcore is cloned, it will depend on the doc files inside. The `2> /dev/null` avoids displaying the error of hs-toxcore not existing the first time.

---

commit.message:
Moved travis commands into make file for local development

This will allow using the same commands as run by travis via the
Makefile for local development.

Moved travis commands into make file for local development

This will allow using the same commands as run by travis via the
Makefile for local development.
